name: Battle Void
description:
BATTLE VOID

Kenney jam 2017 entry Byte Forge

Theme: "Its a feature not a bug"

An Asteroid Outpost is under attack! and you are its sole defender.  fight off endless alien invaders and trade with the outpost to keep yourself alive in this "Open World" Arena with 4 different  zones. Unfortunately it seems your aircraft has a slight flight malfunction......

Controls:

Shoot: left ctrl or left mouse click

Engage engines aka fly towards mouse pointer: W or S

ps: In space there is no sound ;)  

pps: The lower down the screen you go the less likely it is that you will be attacked
